1.content:
The winter wind caresses your skin as you slowly walk down the gray dimly lit street in the evening. You look at your life from when it was happy and joyful and miss those days with your mom and dad. "*sigh* Why-, grr, how did things go like this for me... I never did anything bad did I?" You keep walking down your town staring at your evicted notice paper. "Great... Yesterday I lost my job, and now I'm homeless..." As you walk more into town, your eyes turn to focus on another missing person poster. "Not another one, this is the fifth one this week! I can't help feeling that, that 'Dr.' is the one to blame for these disappearances, but if this day gets any worse, he's the only guy I can turn to." As the day unfolds, you find that today is the last day you can stay in your apartment and that you only have enough money for one last meal.This puts you in the perspective that the doc is your only choice. Later, the sky gets pretty dark and you know that right now is your last chance to get something to eat before you go to the 'Dr.'s office'. You choose to eat at someplace special, and after eating, you make your way to Lander st. and find the ally where the 'Dr.' would be. "Now you might feel a little tingling in your stomach, but that's completely normal, have a nice life!" "Thank you doctor, have a good day." Soon you and the doc meet each other eye to eye. He's a little overweight and has a half buttoned up lab coat. His pants are a dark gray and has bandages on his face all the way up to cover his mouth. "So, you come for medicine as well?" He starts, beginning to really look and see who the next costumer is. "Yes sir" You reply, sure as you'll ever be. "B- but you- you're so young! You have your whole life ahead of you!" He says, noticing your only like 16 to 17 years old. "Yeah, that's why I''m taking this shot..." "Well, alright then, and remember what I said to the customer before." "Yeah, I got it..." you said, almost annoyed. As you finally get home, the tingling feeling that the doctor was talking about starts invading your stomach. "Ok, he said that this was ...*yawn* normal, but was drowsiness another normal symptom? Oh well, maybe I'm really just tired." And with that, you go to bed. While you sleep you are unaware of the changes happening to you. You are reduced to nothing more then a light which is actually your soul and is now entering an unborn being!!
What you, and even the Dr. didn't know was that the chemical somehow makes you start a new life all over again from the day of being born, and it could be anything!
Now you see a light in the tunnel and you can't remember what happened before now! Whats gonna happen?

Let's start!

(Note that this story stars when you are reborn, shows about the many choices you make, so shake it up! There can also be crazy adventures with transformations and gender benders... Also, the point is that sooner or later, you remember a little of your past life and feel like you need it back! In the end, they remember everything and get the choice to turn back or stay the person or animal they are forever!)
1.title: The last day of your old life

11.content: What are you gonna be in your new life?
11.title: Choice time

choices: An athletic girl, plays different sports, a bit humorous (B)
Very intelligent, Excels in everything that you set your mind to (C)
Chubby girl, a real dreamer, and can invent stuff, but a bit lazy (C)
111.content: You have three types to choose from (sizes)
111.title: Another girl

1111.content:
You were reborn and kind of lost your memory…
But now 16 years later, the time your old life was running, you suddenly started to remember:
Your name is Lisa and you are a cheerleader, very popular around school and everywhere….
You live with your parents in a nice house in New York, Queens. Your Dad works for a business consulting company and has an office downtown Manhattan.
Your mother is a doctor at the hospital. Both of your parents love you, but you are a single child, since after your birth and your growing up years they started again to focus on the job carriers and became successful again in that area.
This has made you a though girl, very independent, but you enjoy and appreciate the moments you have with your parents. Somehow in your mind you feel like losing your parents is almost one of the most worse things a person can have as a fate. You almost feel sometimes that you have gone through this before, but of course that is not real, only some strange dream.
Those strange dreams are happening more often the last couple of days; they feel like they are yours, but also of some other person. This is very much confusing. You think about talking to your mom about this, but you guess her answer will be “this is normal for a girl of your age,” or she might make an appointment with one of her doctor colleagues, who is a psychic therapist! And this is not what you want at all!

Tonight you have another of those nightmares, but this time it is even stranger:
You are on the cheerleader’s training as you suddenly feel a strange attraction to your friend Mary, who is also a cheerleader: She like all of the girls wears short skirt and the typical uniform….
But today (in your dream!) you feel kind of attracted to her, you feel boyish…Suddenly you feel also hot in your groin area: And with panic you see something very boyish there: An erecting, your are no longer wearing your uniform but some boys outfit…
The lust for Mary is overwhelming and also the feeling of a male member as suddenly your phone rings.
You answer it and someone said: “Your parents had an accident and both passed away”…
Shocked you try to wake up…
1111.title: An athletic girl, plays different sports, a bit...

choices: something is strange in the mirror
11111.content: Covered with sweat you woke up. Switching on the light and looking into the mirror you are happy to see and be yourself, a girl…
11111.title: wake up

But you suddenly get an intense headache and all you old memories returned to your mind.

You are very confused as you know you are a girl but also a boy at the same time..

11331111.title: Cattle

113311112.content:
Blink, and the eyes open, you looking up at a darkened shadowed ceiling. What bonds bound you were then gone, as you move slowly, raising your right arm.

"Whoa, that cannot be my arm!" You thought, but discovered you could not say the words.

Odd, you feel the air as moving, your nose feels cold, but the rest of you feels quite comfortable, neither chilled or overly warm.

"What did he do, that crazy old man neighbor..., he seemed as nice, but you never expected anything like this as happening!" You again thought, but wanting to speak you struggled to draw a word or even a tone from out your throat.

Breathing in as out, huffing your breaths, as then a rolling groan was issued out your agape mouth, you hearing yourself cry a bellowed, "Moo...!"
113311112.title: What of Me is Real

1133111122.content:
Remembering back to those first few years after being born as a normal human male baby, you grew and became what most people thought of as a nice person, somebody friendly, or willing to be of help. When you became a teenager, you happened to meet an elderly man, he going by the name of Hank Smyth.

Hank resided in a old house built in the late 1880's, it as still painted white, was well kept, and so too were the two barns on the property. Your meet happened by chance, happening when riding past her home on your ten- speed bike, you heard a man yell. That caring person, you responded to the shrieked cry, as leaped off your bike and ran toward the house. What you saw next was Hank kicking out from his house back door, as ran a large Mastiff breed dog. Sheila, Hank was yelling at the dog, saying something, about it not trying to act like she was still a wife.

That and then was when he being in a rage saw you there on his property. He then gave you an evil stare. Hank pointed at you with one of his arthritic kinked index fingers, and called aloud, he said, "Crystal, deal with another unwanted trespasser!"

You can recall to this very day what happened next, as from inside the house, or the living room, as beaming through a glass pane shot toward you a gold-yellow ray of light what engulfed you. As the ray caused you to stop, as made to stand there immobile, but feeling warmth from the ray of light. Its beam reached inside your mind, it searching for what it hoped was there, finding of a situation recalled as being humiliating.

"No, please not again, not that, why, why must you..." you can remember your asking of some power as it dredged up a foolish time when you were found out, got-caught in a barn while learning personally, about the birds and bees.

As with a sudden surge of weird sensations, you remember well as all your clothing you had on then turned into a black ash piled at your feet.
You looked with fear at Hank, he staring at you, as the yellow rays of light took control of your mind and body. Realizing something as happening, the blinding ray of light doing, as causing your body to change.

Scared and near to hyperventilating your breathing as the changing began, light headed feelings became brutal sensations as a curse engulfed the old you. The magical crystal held you, it making from what was born human to becoming black of skin, as black fur sprouted, grew dense, a pelt of fur covered you from face to feet.

You screamed, wishing to plead but all what came from out your opened mouth sounded like a bellowed cry.
1133111122.title: Found Stout Memories

11331111221.content:
You had as dredged up from a dark memory, when a few years the younger, you were bullied by older boys. They constantly would bother you, nagging that you were dumb, as needed to ask what your parents were too humiliated to discuss. Instead, you had ventured to the Killingsworth farm, and there at night you mingled with a corralled few heifers.

Black as was that moonless night, the heifers were calm and friendly, as if wishing to know you as you wanted to know more about what is life. A very friendly Black Angus breed yearling heifer tried in odds manners of offering you to inspect her body.

She became overly insistent that you touch as fondle.
It was then when from the heifers lowing, a night watchman-farmhand saw you, as caught you gaining carnal knowledge about female cows.

That humiliating scene was what the Crystal drew to the forefront of your mind as it, began a reformation of the fool teenager to being a Black Angus breed of a Minotaur.

Moaning from the mild pains you knew were doing your body harm. You felt the swelling of what became as a bullish size scrotum. Your own changes began there, you feeling your balls becoming weighty, sagging, the skin furry.

Next was the changes to urinary plumbing, as a boyish penis retracted up, moving inside your groin, to weaseling upward, where formed a black furred as having long dangling hairs, you grew a bovine sheath. Your new sheath set two inches below your navel, as blackened skin became blacker, as dense bovine hide, with thick fur everywhere on your body, arms, legs, and then about a changing head.

The only real pain came with the jutting surge of your soon to be bovine bullish tail sprouting as growing to be your new appendage.

Flicking of your tail and the sensations from something messaging what until then set out of sight, buried between your buttocks. As the tail worked to cause arousing feelings, letting you see then a bovine penis, becoming the cock of a brute yearling Angus bull.

It was then while you had human hands, furry hands, that as there in front of Hank with him watching, he smiling, you felt a drastic need and masturbated!

As the body began to change and conform to you becoming more then as bovine, as a animal, you watched in silence when Hank came near, he smiling, and said to you, "What the Crystal must have uncovered led you to being an Angus breed Minotaur-teenager, now how sexy is that!"

Even as he spoke, the golden rays seemed to intensify, as your pelvis felt changes, and legs, heels, and feet conformed rather quickly. You groaned, but not from pain, feeling instead how your stance on changing legs bade you to feel a need to meet a friendly heifer.

113311122.content: Are you a boy or girl?
113311122.title: Gender

113311211.content:
Sandy, as all his friends called him was flying into Africa; a trip planned and looked forward to these many months back at college. A student of science he was soon to get a degree in Biology. Now though he was looking forward to three weeks of fun and friendship as he visited his Father's new African expedition. Dr. Francis L. Chapman, Sandy's father, had for the past ten years working on a special project, "The Nunji Tribe and their plant enzyme medicines."

As Sandy got off the plane, he faced the ninety plus degree heat and his Father waving. Son and Father, both family and the best of friends had many of the same interests. It was his Father who first interested Sandy in coming out to visit, and promised him the time of his life!

A five hour ride by Jeep had Sandy unloading his gear and rubbing his rear from bumps, bumps, and more bumps. His Dad was a great scientist but had no ability as a cab driver. Many a time back at home Sandy would drive Dad to and from his meetings, less there be another accident.

That evening the air was still hot and humid as the stench of sweaty men and their animals mixed to make Sandy pinch his nose. A young Nunji girl named Saysa watched Sandy try to become accustom of his new surroundings. One long hot night and a little sleep had Sandy walking about the camp blurry eyed.

Come breakfast time and to his surprise came this pretty, black, native girl named Saysa presented herself as a guide for him on his first day. She soon introduced herself and the two found many things in common. An almost instant friendship bloomed making Sandy feel as if Saysa was flirting with him. A suggesting wave from Dad authorized him to go off with his new girlfriend, Saysa.

Many things he did see the day until well after sundown the two sauntered into camp. Sandy's Father took exception to the late return as the prowling animals of the plains do their killing after dark.

Worse yet was Saysa's own Father being at the encampment and his words and actions told much. A rough and hard man took Saysa's arm and tossing her into the dusty ground. A kick and then two had her crying as Sandy began to defend his new friend.

"No, stop, don't confront him!' said Saysa to Sandy before he could get close.

Doctor Chapman grabbed Sandy's arm and holding him back, as he whispered that Saysa be granted to the hands of her Father.

"Sandy, Son there are many things one need learn about living on the African plains. Another is to understand the rules of society which the natives made many centuries ago and live by even today. Saysa's Father is the one man I don't want to lose his trust of me or my Son. He is the Medicine Man who can teach me the most about there healing ways. I warn you as well that this Man has in his bag of tricks some things that I a doctor find to be, well bordering on witchcraft, of the most blackest of black.

In a grove of trees one night I watched a young boy maybe nine years old. He was trussed up off the ground by leather straps. The medicine Man danced about tossing a gray powder over the boy and calling on some spirits. I do not believe is spirits but the powder was some chemical he had mixed for just this reason. A boy charged with stealing, condemned, he stood sentenced to a different way of life by the medicine man for his foolishness.

He screamed bloody murder till coated in the powder. Suddenly, he calmed down and just blinked and ogled the Medicine Man. I watched as the boy's figure, legs, and arms became changed from human form and limbs to those of a male goat. The boy hung there until morning, when Saysa and two other girls came to take him down and wash off the gray powder. I then stood dumbfounded as they attached a rein or rope to the goat and took him away." said Doctor Chapman to his son.

"Nice story Pop!" said Sandy with a silly grin.

"No Sandy, true as true can be I hope you take great care about being around Saysa, she's her Father's youngest and he watches over her like a Hawk!" replied the Doctor.

"Dad, I've heard such stories but most are on late night television!' said Sandy still not believing his Dad.

They parted company as the Doctor heard of some problem in the research tent. Sandy took this to be a good time to talk with Saysa and he headed off to the native village.

Half way to the village the light from a roaring campfire took Sandy's attention. Turning from the well worn path he headed across the grassy plain for the fire and a loud group of voices. As he crept up close and looked past a felled old tree he saw to his terror Saysa.

"You have disgraced yourself with this young man, the famous Doctor's Son, said Saysa's Father, as the group of village men sat about in a circle making moaning sounds together.

Saysa held out her hands as if to plead for mercy. Sandy was almost ready to jump into the ring, grab Saysa, and run for the far hills. Then he stopped as her Father took a clay pitcher and doused it over Saysa's head making her scream.

The moaning suddenly stopped. All eyes were on Saysa as she screamed one long terrorized yell and then went silent.

Sandy was half ready to jump up and run when a hand grabbed his shoulder.

"Dad!

Saysa!

Her Father tossed a pitcher of stuff and........," as Sandy began to tell what he'd seen.

Saysa looked up to her friend and screamed some awful pain filled words. Her Father the Medicine Man also looked up and motioned to the Doctor and Sandy to come.

The circle of old men stood up but did not take their eyes off of Saysa.

"But Dad he was......!" Sandy began to say again.

"Come Son, there are some people I guess in this world who must be taught the laws men live by," said the Doctor as he pushed Sandy down to the circle.

Sandy stood looking at Saysa who by know was hunched down and looking at him rather oddly. The Medicine Man stood looking the Doctor into his eyes, as if he had him in some native mind control. Sandy stood there, not at all was he affected by the Man's stare.

"Hey we were just friends, nothing bad happened, she could tell you," spouted Sandy in her defense.

Doctor Chapman stepped back away from Sandy as two men took hold of the young man, and tied his wrists together. A long leather strap was tied to his wrists and in a second or two, Sandy was trussed up like his Father told of some other young male.

Knives bright and sharp cut away Sandy's clothing leaving him scared, struggling, screaming, "We never did anything wrong!"

"I trust you not boy, it is for those who live in our village I keep a strict hand over them!

My Saysa was not born as what you knew of her, she was taken from the plains and allowed to live among us either until she'd forget her beastly ways, or as she with you requires me to make a her and you as cursed. You made her sin, your American sexual ways blackened her soul; against me.

Now as she is and the both of you shall be then under my curse. The black powder here has been handed down the ages giving power to men like myself over those so scared, those feeling it bow to me and beg for mercy!" said the Medicine Man.

"Dad, do something!

I, we did nothing but walk and talk, we never had sex...!" screamed Sandy in a panic.

Sandy's dad stood there beside his son and kept his eyes set looking straight ahead, he saying nothing!

"Your father is as the others here, they all see and know what the powders do to a body. He took a walk with me some months ago and begged to learn the essence of power I use to hold me as tribal leader.

Oh I thought little of him when we first met, but he did well!

I blessed the good doctor, your father with some powder to enhance his body physically and spiritually. It was my Zebra powder and once donned upon a body changes a person to either as a male or female Zebra, mattering as to what their gender was before the changing. Your Father spent what he said was a wondrous week and six terror-filled nights being a male Zebra.

He learned, as Saysa tried to learn, you shall learn now more from Saysa!" said the Medicine Man as he tossed a black powder over Sandy, as then a screaming college student.

A father had to watch as remember later seeing the sifting powder cover Sandy about his head, it drifted down clinging to his sweaty skin. Burning pains made Sandy cry to his father. As words became horrid screams of a youth in pure agony. Eyes welled up with tears as his pain only increased. He looked over to see Saysa in a moment of compassion for the one there who really knew him. Blurry tear drenched eyes gawked at her, seeing Saysa, she then standing below where he hung, and she by that time became again a young female nanny goat.

The Medicine Man made a motion with one hand, as knelt down to begin the milking of his bleating daughter transformed into the form of a goat.

"You now see Saysa as she was born to be, a goat!

Born a goat of her mother a herd doe goat, she so beautiful that I made of her a human, adding her as if part of my family these seven years as if my daughter.

Now due to your disgrace of her, she must become again as the animal she was once.

You, Sandy, son of Doctor Chapman will not be her consort!
113311211.title: First Love Gone Wrong

1133112112.content:
Your body will change young sir, growing much larger similar in species to Saysa, but not as she is, being of the tame animals.

I deem for you to become as an Ibex buck, to be in the wild and at risk by predators upon the open plains.

You as cursed is not enough to be the Ibex animal, I want for Sandy to remember who and what he was before becoming the animal.

You will learn quickly to graze and be alert. Your days as a buck will bring on the maddening drives for mating. As Saysa remembers you for a time, you will remember her, but being what you are as a wild beast, you may never come in contact with her again!" explained the Medicine Man.

"NO, oh God no you cannot do this to me!

Dad, Father do something!" screamed Sandy as his body began to fade from the human race.

"I am sorry you came here Son, it would have been better for you, never to have come!

I must do as the Medicine man tells me to do!

I want to learn his medicines, the strange powers they control and I am willing to trade even my son for bettering my knowledge of this new science. You and your new life will be the savior of those who might die without this new knowledge!" said the Doctor to his fading son.

Sandy tried to respond his tongue felt very strange as if grown long and thin. He strained to focus his eyes on those walking away or even Saysa. Fire like burning pain was searing his skin black and making it into the hide of an Ibex. As if adding insult to injury, he felt hands touching his maleness.

Then such a spike of pain, as the magical hands jammed his penis up into his gut. Feeling his fingers and toes lose their sense of touch, becoming stiff, and hard as they changed into hooves, black and cloven were his hooves. He cried out but the only sound he could muster as a high pitch bleat, of a young ram.

Black hairs sprouted out of changing skin, upon this he cried out for his father again. The scream and those that followed had the singular tone of a male Ibex at the height of being a horny male.

Struggling at his bonds, he gained a greater male erection. The erection doing something even Sandy never expected, he and his long reddish member struggled as it slapped at furry flanks. Sensations the essence of being an animal and learning to trust what he would smell, hear, see, and feel.

The touching done of his long erection and village men stroking, patting to furry hide gave Sandy the desire to become an Ibex sire.

Suddenly, What was becoming of Sandy, he felt such passion in his chest and lust like he had never known coming from his groin, he could hardly wait until the morning when they would come to cut his bonds and let a male Ibex run free.

The circle of black men began to wander off as Sandy hung there, he still changing.

The Medicine Man put a rope about Saysa's neck and tied her to a nearby post.

Then he stepped past Sandy to speak with the goodly doctor and taking his hand he said, "My good Doctor fear not for the young man will soon feel the desire to run free and join his kind. He shall remember everything that has happened on this night, and for some time to come those memories will burn into his brain.

The one thing that will free him from the grief of his dishonored action will be after he has mated for three years.

To see him struggle, the instincts are in him to run free and as well he will long to mate. I suspect he will be a good sire of many to his kind. Be pleased for him that he even in disgrace can contribute to the way of life here on the plains of Africa.

For you your Sandy is a worthy trade, as I shall be your guide to learning the powers of our special life saving and future changing powders. I know your willingness to understand the powders, and promise made to assure now that your son will not interfere in our mutual trust, and future relationship!"

A sad and still distressed stepfather stood there looking past the Medicine man speaking to him, he seeing what was becoming of his stepson. Watching then as Sandy being so much more akin to being an animal, to where his mother, or a good friend would not recognize him.

Struggling and bleating, Sandy turned to where his eyes met those of his stepfather staring at his animal son,. Sandy bleated his then Ibex cry he could but watch as his human Dad, turned his back to Sandy and with the learned tribal Medicine man at his side, he walked out of sight.

More changing continued, as Sandy was let alone, trussed up and standing on by then the hind legs of the Ibex, he was soon to become as if born an animal. The rank scent left there by Saysa the doe goat had Sandy aching, feeling a want building in him, and new sensations had Sandy wild with passion.

He could see Saysa, she back in her animal self, tied to a post. His love felt for her was fading fast. He knew she could not hold him inside her, and he needed badly to find a mate like him, of his kind, he feeling more proud to be as an Ibex.

He could not stop the lust and building passions beginning to make him long for being wholly like a true born animal.

Wild and never imagined sensations of wanting to stand as mounted and he mating with an Ibex female, Sandy knowing what he was born, thinking of how he had changed, appreciating his transformation. He ignored much of how magical, massive hands molded his head, restructured his bones, hardening his body. Sandy stood there feeling massive strength, new agility, and what felt most delightful sensation from how masculine he felt.

Later in the early morning light, Sandy watched the Medicine Man stride proudly up to an almost completely changed mature male Ibex. A smile came over his face and from his left pocket came a small bottle of elixir. Reaching up he poured it down the open mouth with a dry, lolling tongue.

The slow flowing liquid spread slowly about the agape mouth. Sandy could only watch and twitch from the tickling sensation. Tilting his Ibex head for a better view, Sandy strained to give back an infectious lick.

"You are now as you shall remain young one, permanently a male Ibex, a true to form herd sire!

Your memories of what you were shall continue through three mating seasons. As the sexual urges continue your human mind will wear quite thin. You, I would expect shall become a herd member and on your third anniversary of this night, will become a common as ignorant Ibex buck!
1133112112.title: A Traitorous Stepfather...

choices: Infectious nature of an Ibex buck...
11331121122.content:
"He shall continue to change, his body becoming solid of muscles, his stamina equal to a stout sire Ibex. Your stepson wears a curse, but his loss will be a blessing to you, the Doctor, as you will carry our understanding of the African herb and powders back to America.

Now I want you to know this as pay close attention, if Sandy were to be so foolish as try to act human or maybe communicate with any authority during the coming three years, I promise to make of his stepfather to pay a horrible price. He would receive some special perfumed powder, it will deceive, as make the great Doctor dream of his becoming the best learned Zebra stud any zoo would be proud to own, trust my warning!" chided the Medicine Man.

Months later, as the previously unknown doctor became world renown, the royalties pouring into his bank account, there arrived an envelope in his daily mail. Opening it with wonder, as the return address was to a postal box in a small town in the western region of the Serengeti plains.

Inside the envelope was a photo, and with it a small hand written note.

"Good day sir doctor,

I and those of our village have discovered new pleasures from the wealth you sent and we received. I expect you to keep your part of the bargain promise.

As for your son, he is actively doing what to him is becoming more his nature, he every day here on the plains. As a vivid reminder to the men of our growing village as our bargain. I wish to assure you that the request by you about your stepson, as his days are numbered to live on the Serengeti Park. I would agree to your terms and additional royalty payments, as order the capture and shipment of Sandy to a zoo of your choice, where he can live as safe from harm.

If I do not get more new wealth, the same and similar could be as real for you as well!

Sincerely."
_____________________________________________________

Due to the threat, more monies went into the accounts of the tribe and their leader. As a great doctor felt sad for his son, the request for the capturing of Sandy, and he returned to American, living at a zoo, where he could live, and do as he pleased in safety.

Sandy went with ease into his captivity; he delighted when arriving at the zoo, saw, as knew his father there in the crowd of onlookers. The doctor and his son renewed their relationship, although Sandy preferred female Ibex does, he would on off days occasionally lure young women into his pen, and there he would write in the sand, communicating, as daring to show them the possibilities of gifted their wildest of delights.
11331121122.title: A Change of Hearts

info.brief_description: You now enter a new life as someone or something different... What are you?
info.description:
Your life seemed pretty good at the start, but things turned for the worst after your parents died, you lost a job, and now your about to lose your apartment. Because of your parents death and no other relatives to care for you, you never got to finish school.Since everything was just going downhill with no sign of anything good happening, your only thought is to end your life, but you didn't want to go into extremes, so the next thing was this guy you heard about. Everyone that was jobless or homeless always talked about him and how he makes them start anew. The only problem is that ever since he's been in town, people have started to go missing and are never found. You didn't know if you could trust him, but the sound of poverty wasn't appealing to you either, so you feel as if you have no choice.

No dying too fast or by something random i.e. a sniper or a meteor out of no where
Sex is allowed, but please don't get into all of the details...
